name: places/ChIJFzu9fZxZwokRRcyfqYbgqPA
formattedAddress: 32 St Marks Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 32 St Marks Pl, New York, NY 10003-8033, USA

editorialSummary.text: Shop offering diverse fashion jewelry as well as high-quality body jewelry, plus a piercing salon.

originalText.text: Elaine is the best! Professional, clean, affordable piercing; she did my rook and helix. Very informative and very patient with all of my questions!

text.text: Elaine is the best! Professional, clean, affordable piercing; she did my rook and helix. Very informative and very patient with all of my questions!

originalText.text: After a month I go to them because I noticed a small bump they said everything should be fine few days later I get this! Bleeding and really  infected, it was because of sanitation problem from them. I took care of it exactly how they advices me to and on when asked for a refund since it really messed up my ear and I am removing it and their service wasn’t delivered the guy was rude his name is Adam. He said it’s not his problem and that he is not giving me anything back. I’m writing this review so that you can watch out, sanitation is everything and this could’ve been worse.

originalText.text: Jorge was excellent and so friendly!!! I was a little nervous because it was my first piercing but Jorge was so gentle and so professional I didn’t even feel a pinch. Thank you Jorge for an amazing experience. I will for sure be coming back to you!

text.text: Jorge was excellent and so friendly!!! I was a little nervous because it was my first piercing but Jorge was so gentle and so professional I didn’t even feel a pinch. Thank you Jorge for an amazing experience. I will for sure be coming back to you!

originalText.text: I got pierced here in September and it was a basic ear lobe re-pierce. Since then for the past 4 months it’s been on and off infected where fluid needed to be drained out of it. I kept putting getting it looked at off because I do have multiple other ear piercings, helix, conch, nose and never had this much of a complication on such a standard area. I called the shop and they assured me all of the jewelry used here was implant grade titanium which I don’t doubt but was a concern because I’m used to piercing aftercare and knew that it wasn’t me mishandling the proper healing regimen. I went to a different piercer today @shawn pierce who I’ve seen on YouTube for years and the minute he took a look at it he said the angle, jewelry and placement of it was all messed up and to never go back to where I got this done and removed it so it can heal and be done properly. Just money down the drain for my experience here.

I went to a different piercer today @shawn pierce who I’ve seen on YouTube for years and the minute he took a look at it he said the angle, jewelry and placement of it was all messed up and to never go back to where I got this done and removed it so it can heal and be done properly. Just money down the drain for my experience here.

originalText.text: This place is awesome! Jorge was exceptional wonderful, gentle and truly talented. The piercing was quick, painless and without any issues whatsoever. He walked me through how to take care and clean the piercing. Jorge is well trained and you will clearly understand how skilled he is by taking to you. Giving you your best options and allowing you to feel comfortable with your piercing. Thank you !
